enum.name: passwordComplexityModel
enum.description: The security level/complexity model for user passwords

value.description: Medium - min 6 chars, upper, lower and numeric
Good - min 8 chars, upper, lower, numeric and punctuation
Strong - min 10 chars, upper, lower, numeric and punctuation

text.name: fromEmail
text.description: Email Address that all email's that the system sends will be sent from.

text.name: passwordResetEmailSubject
text.description: The subject of the password reset email to be sent to clients. Bindings are allowed relative to the User.

markup.name: passwordResetEmailBody
markup.description: The body of the password reset email to be sent to clients. Bindings are allowed relative to the User.

association.name: userSelfRegistrationGroup
association.description:
The user group which specifies role-access for self-registering users.
To disable self-registration, leave this group unselected, or select a group with minimal access permissions.

boolean.name: allowUserSelfRegistration
boolean.description: Master switch to allow or disallow self registration.
